languages.text: "Похоже, Закон на Даргонусе дал трещину, стоило его хозя{mf|ину|йке} оставить его без внимания. Сбивчивые новости с поверхности звучат странно, даже подозрительно... но только вам под силу положить конец любой ереси на собственной планете".

"It seems the law faltered on Dargonus as soon as its {mf|master|mistress} left it unattended. The disjointed reports from the ground sound strange, if not outright suspicious... but only you can put an end to any heresy on your own planet."
languages.original_text: "Похоже, Закон на Даргонусе дал трещину, стоило его хозя{mf|ину|йке} оставить его без внимания. Сбивчивые новости с поверхности звучат странно, даже подозрительно... но только вам под силу положить конец любой ереси на собственной планете".

traits.locale_text: "It seems the Law faltered on Dargonus as soon as its {mf|master|mistress} left it unattended. The disjointed reports from the ground sound strange, if not outright suspicious... but only you can put an end to any heresy on your own planet."

"It seems the Law faltered on Dargonus as soon as its owner left it unattended. The disjointed reports from the ground sound strange if not outright suspicious... but only you can put an end to any heresy on your own planet."

"It seems the Law faltered on Dargonus as soon as its {mf|master|mistress} left it unattended. The disjointed reports from the ground sound strange, if not outright suspicious... but only you can put an end to any heresy on your own planet."

"It seems the Law faltered on Dargonus as soon as its {mf|master|mistress} left it unattended. The disjointed reports from the ground sound strange, if not outright suspicious... but only you can put an end to any heresy on your own planet."

"It seems the law faltered on Dargonus as soon as its {mf|master|mistress} left it unattended. The disjointed reports from the ground sound strange, if not outright suspicious... but only you can put an end to any heresy on your own planet."

"It seems the law faltered on Dargonus as soon as its {mf|master|mistress} left it unattended. The disjointed reports from the ground sound strange, if not outright suspicious... but only you can put an end to any heresy on your own planet."

languages.text: "Anscheinend ist das Gesetz auf Dargonus zusammengebrochen, sobald {mf|sein Herr|seine Herrin} es ohne Aufsicht zurückgelassen hat. Die bruchstückhaften Berichte vom Boden klingen merkwürdig, wenn nicht gar verdächtig ... aber nur Ihr könnt jedweder Ketzerei auf Eurem eigenen Planeten ein Ende bereiten."
languages.original_text: "It seems the law faltered on Dargonus as soon as its {mf|master|mistress} left it unattended. The disjointed reports from the ground sound strange, if not outright suspicious... but only you can put an end to any heresy on your own planet."

traits.locale_text: "Anscheinend ist das Gesetz auf Dargonus zusammengebrochen, sobald {mf|sein Herr|seine Herrin} es ohne Aufsicht zurückgelassen hat. Die bruchstückhaften Berichte vom Boden klingen merkwürdig, wenn nicht gar verdächtig ... aber nur Ihr könnt jedweder Ketzerei auf Eurem eigenen Planeten ein Ende bereiten."

languages.text: « De toute évidence, le respect de la loi a décliné sur Dargonus en l'absence de {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse}. Les rapports décousus que nous avons reçus de la surface semblent bien étranges, voire suspects... Vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez mettre un terme à l'hérésie sur votre propre planète. »
languages.original_text: "It seems the law faltered on Dargonus as soon as its {mf|master|mistress} left it unattended. The disjointed reports from the ground sound strange, if not outright suspicious... but only you can put an end to any heresy on your own planet."

traits.locale_text: « De toute évidence, le respect de la loi a décliné sur Dragonus en l'absence de {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse}. Les rapports décousus que nous avons reçus de la surface semblent bien étranges, voire suspects... Vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez mettre un terme à l'hérésie sur votre propre planète. »

languages.text: “看来，达戈努斯的主人不在的这段时间，这里的律法也没那么稳固了。地面传来的那些断断续续的报告听起来很古怪，甚至可以说相当可疑……不过，既然你的行星爆发了异端恶行，那恐怕只有你才能阻止。”
languages.original_text: "It seems the law faltered on Dargonus as soon as its {mf|master|mistress} left it unattended. The disjointed reports from the ground sound strange, if not outright suspicious... but only you can put an end to any heresy on your own planet."

traits.locale_text: “看来，达戈努斯的主人不在的这段时间，这里的律法也没那么稳固了。地面传来的那些断断续续的报告听起来很古怪，甚至可以说相当可疑……不过，既然你的行星爆发了异端恶行，那恐怕只有你才能阻止。”

languages.text: «Parece que la ley ha flaqueó en Dargonus en cuanto su señor{mf||a} lo dejó desatendido. Los informes inconexos que llegan desde la superficie son extraños, si no directamente sospechosos... pero solo usted puede acabar con la herejía en su propio planeta».
languages.original_text: "It seems the law faltered on Dargonus as soon as its {mf|master|mistress} left it unattended. The disjointed reports from the ground sound strange, if not outright suspicious... but only you can put an end to any heresy on your own planet."

traits.locale_text: «Parece que la ley ha flaqueó en Dargonus en cuanto su señor{mf||a} lo dejó desatendido. Los informes inconexos que llegan desde la superficie son extraños, si no directamente sospechosos... pero solo usted puede acabar con la herejía en su propio planeta».

languages.text: 「ダルゴナスは、{mf|主人|女主人}が不在の間に法が揺らいだようです。現地からの断片的な報告は奇妙で、むしろ疑わしいものに聞こえます…ですが、あなたご自身だけが、あなたの惑星で起きている大逆を終わらせることができるのです」
languages.original_text: "It seems the law faltered on Dargonus as soon as its {mf|master|mistress} left it unattended. The disjointed reports from the ground sound strange, if not outright suspicious... but only you can put an end to any heresy on your own planet."

traits.locale_text: 「ダルゴナスは、{mf|主人|女主人}が不在の間に法が揺らいだようです。現地からの断片的な報告は奇妙で、むしろ疑わしいものに聞こえます…ですが、あなたご自身だけが、あなたの惑星で起きている大逆を終わらせることができるのです」

languages.text: "Yasa, efendinin Dargonus'tan ayrılmasıyla sendelemiş gibi görünüyor. Gelen çelişkili raporlar garip, hatta şüpheli. Fakat bu gezegendeki her türlü kâfirliği sona erdirebilecek tek kişi sizsiniz."
languages.original_text: "It seems the law faltered on Dargonus as soon as its {mf|master|mistress} left it unattended. The disjointed reports from the ground sound strange, if not outright suspicious... but only you can put an end to any heresy on your own planet."

traits.locale_text: "Yasa, {mf|efendinin}, Dargonus'tan ayrılmasıyla sendelemiş gibi görünüyor. Gelen çelişkili raporlar garip hatta şüpheli. Fakat bu gezegendeki her türlü kâfirliği sona erdirebilecek tek kişi sizsiniz."
